OOC: well, this post is the answer of Rdhal's attack of 
Chivtrons'basse.

Windlord/Quetzalcoatl/Nightlight:::

"BY ALL HAWKS!!!"shouted Windlord when the bean stroke the 
base"WHAT'S THAT?????"

************

Quetzalcoatl looked he couldn't understand what was going on.

***********

Nightlight opened the door and left the ship, she tried to find out 
what was happening.
